caption: A chilled ambient electronic track with evolving pad textures, gentle arpeggios, and whispered vocals. Features field recordings, granular synthesis, and a meditative atmosphere perfect for relaxation and introspection.
lyrics:
[Intro]

[Verse 1]
Breathing in the morning air
Sunlight dancing everywhere
Let the world just fall away
Find your peace in this new day

[Chorus]
Be still and know
Let your spirit flow
In this moment find
Quiet of the mind

[Verse 2]
Waves are lapping on the shore
Nothing matters anymore
Just the rhythm of your heart
This is where healing starts

[Chorus]
Be still and know
Let your spirit flow
In this moment find
Quiet of the mind

[Outro]

Be still
Be still
